summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1306, for the improvement of Boren Avenue North, from John Street to Denny Way; and Denny Way from Boren Avenue North to Westlake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle by constructing a sewer therein, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 14496 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
